Regulation Name(s): Tumor associated antigen immunological test systems
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VIDAS® AFP Assay, an automated ELFA test for quantitative measurement of alpha-fetoprotein in human serum to aid management of nonseminomatous testicular carcinoma
Indications for Use Summary: Automated quantitative test for measurement of alpha-fetoprotein in human serum using ELFA on VIDAS instruments to aid in management of patients with nonseminomatous testicular carcinoma
